data.text: @PaulRieckhoff @JimLaPorta @NBCThisisUs @Dan_Fogelman @MiloVentimiglia @TheMandyMoore @morningmika @Morning_Joe So glad to see that someone whose work I've admired cares about our community. It's really gratifying. Thank you, @MiloVentimiglia

@JimLaPorta @NBCThisisUs @Dan_Fogelman @MiloVentimiglia @TheMandyMoore Wonderful analysis @JimLaPorta. You touched on how the show accurately portrays the war & veteran experience. Love the fact that @NBCThisisUs delivers truthful storytelling that isn’t exaggerated. Despite all he endured, Jack @MiloVentimiglia found his way.
@JimLaPorta @NBCThisisUs @Dan_Fogelman @MiloVentimiglia @TheMandyMoore @morningmika @Morning_Joe And speaking of looking young. Check out the sprightly @WillieGeist in that video!

@JimLaPorta @NBCThisisUs @Dan_Fogelman @MiloVentimiglia @TheMandyMoore .@MiloVentimiglia’s not new to our community or our issues. He gets it. And has always had our back. He’s a true advocate for vets. Here’s clip from when we all looked a bit younger: https://t.co/H07IdHLlFf with @morningmika on @Morning_Joe.

@JimLaPorta @mattbc @NBCThisisUs @Dan_Fogelman @MiloVentimiglia @TheMandyMoore The VA did everything in its power not to treat him. Took 3 Senators and many veteran's groups to even get him evaluated for a lung transplant, and by then, it was too late. If we are going to be at war for decades, then we must, as a nation, pay for the ongoing care of veterans.

@JimLaPorta @mattbc @NBCThisisUs @Dan_Fogelman @MiloVentimiglia @TheMandyMoore Thank you. He was a gift to all of us. Vietnam left scars, and Agent Orange finally claimed him after years of suffering. But he was gracious and good and generous, one of the best men I knew. We were lucky to have him.

@JimLaPorta @mattbc @NBCThisisUs @Dan_Fogelman @MiloVentimiglia @TheMandyMoore I will, thank you. Merchant Mariners don't get a lot of credit for what they did in Vietnam, sadly. Nearly every one of his brothers and cousins went. Some came back. We just laid to rest my uncle who served in the Army in Vietnam this May. It's never far away for us.

@JimLaPorta @mattbc @NBCThisisUs @Dan_Fogelman @MiloVentimiglia @TheMandyMoore This photo caught me cold: it looks so much like my dad's best friend and cousin who was KIA in Vietnam saving his men. We have a shot of him that is strikingly similar. I got chills when it came up on my timeline.

I haven't watched #ThisIsUs but I think I'm going to fix that.
@JimLaPorta @NBCThisisUs @Dan_Fogelman @MiloVentimiglia @TheMandyMoore Looks like he has three compasses. That’s lieutenant level lost if you need three.
